title: If you could eat anything...
content:
...what would you eat? If what you would eat is something not listed here, choose other and explain what it is. Explain why you would eat it.Signed, Harvey Smith

title: I'd eat:
content:
Well, garg is okay (only if cooked just right), [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]
Eating yorp is just inhumain, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img]
I don't eat Wormouths, because my aunt ate one, and from then on, at random moments, here stomach would triple in size. She died while riding a rollercoaster, because she just couldn't stomach it, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wormouth.gif[/img]
Shockshund has a slightly shocking flavor, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shockshund.gif[/img]
Korath's don't have enough meat, and when you do have enough, they are quite tough, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-korath.gif[/img]
Now Dopefish is delicious!!! You can serve it with anything, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]
Though, My favorite food would be cake!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]
(Darn, that stupid lick keeps lighting my candles, will I ever get my cake? - Stay tuned for chaper two)

-- NAJAWA --

title: W-T-F-?
content:

Edit: This poll is rather strange.. Although a door would probably taste good.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: W-T-F-?
content:
LMAO [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]
This is such a stupid/pointless/insignificant topic!!!
Ordinarily if I were a mod/admin, i'd lock it this instant, but you gotta give some credit for it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I would like to (as mentioned above) feast on the souls of others or at least take a bite out of myself. I would never bite anybody else though. At least I know where my body has been. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img] -- Censorship is F**ked! --

title: Re: W-T-F-?
content:
1.) Doors: Doors can easily be consumed, I am in the process of eating one, as per the instructions on Berniklands website. {I am sanding small pieces off and sprinkling them on my cereal, I shall eat the whole door in oooh, 20 years.]

2.) Like Elephants are inedible, heh.

3.) I'm eating air right now.

4.) It id s little known fact that each time you swallow you consume a few thousand cheek cells that fall off inside you mouth. Each day you also consume about a quart of nasal mucous, and half a cup of tears.

5.) I always try to consume interesting animals. I have managed to eat sparrows, quails, mice, a rat, dog, cat, possum, pukeko [Very tough] and several others plus the usual fish, chicken, cow and pig, etc In answering this I'd have to say I've always wondered what fruitbat tastes like.

A proud member of the signature stealing society

-Levellord

title: Re: Geez:
content:
The concept in its modern form [As opposed to the ancient form of 'Utopia'] was first seriously mentioned in the Truman administration during the war as some kind of ideal to fight for. It was developed further during the cold war [Those damn Ruskies always opposing peace, us always defending it.] and bloomed especially in the drug fueled 60's and 70's [Make love not war!]

Its easy to see why its total skit.A proud member of the signature stealing society

Hmm...

1. A door would be too splintery.
2. No, there aren't enough of them left, and I don't want to wipe their species off the face of the planet,
3. It really isn't possible to eat yourself
4. I'd eat this smilie [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] , dopefish [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] , and cake![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]
